A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poorly written. Many subplots were not interesting and fell short. For the time gap between the previous movie and this one\, characters have had major off screen changes that don't represent their change. Several characters left under developed. Many plot holes and contradictions throughout the movie that just leave the viewer more confused than invested in a sequel. Ending also fell short with no real catch to want to see a third. Story felt very long for the little that took place. Several subplots could have been avoided. End was also very lackluster. Felt like the ending of a series rather than a to be continued. Left the viewer with little to invest in for seeing a continuation of the story.
